title: Schindler's List
shortDescription: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: Goodfellas
shortDescription: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
shortDescription: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: The Lion King
shortDescription: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

title: Saving Private Ryan
shortDescription: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: The Green Mile
shortDescription: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

title: Interstellar
shortDescription: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Prestige
shortDescription: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

title: The Departed
shortDescription: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: Whiplash
shortDescription: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
shortDescription: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: Parasite
shortDescription: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
shortDescription: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with a mysterious woman, Furiosa, to try and survive.

title: The Truman Show
shortDescription: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

title: Inglourious Basterds
shortDescription: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: The Social Network
shortDescription: The story of the founders of Facebook and the battles over ownership of the company.

title: Django Unchained
shortDescription: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

title: The Matrix
shortDescription: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Se7en
shortDescription: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: The Sixth Sense
shortDescription: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.
